title: Braun Series 7 - The Smart Shaver that reads and adapts to your beard
description: The Braun Series 7 shaver includes Sonic technology to read and adapt to your beard. Four shaving elements capture more hair in every stroke to provide a close, comfortable shave without compromises.

asset.author: Braun
asset.description:
The Braun Series 7 shaver includes Sonic technology to read and adapt to your beard. Four shaving elements capture more hair in every stroke to provide a close, comfortable shave without compromises.
Learn more: http://uk.braun.com/en-gb/male-grooming/shavers-for-men/series-7

transcripts: New series 7 from Braun with an ad fully flexible shaving head that perfectly adapts to contours and with unique sonic technology that reads and adapts to the density of your beard for fewer strokes and a shave gentler than ever before, new series seven from Braun.
